# The `LinkingGlobalData` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

This class keeps data and services common for the whole linking process. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>class llvm::dwarf_linker::parallel::LinkingGlobalData</CodeBlock>

## Description {#details}

This class keeps data and services common for the whole linking process.
